I'm not sorry I upgraded but at the same time I'm not sure it was a necessary upgrade. I'm aware that I suffer from upgradeitous!

Reviews.Title: The only option for aviation apps
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought my iPad 3 for using aviation apps in my airplane. The aviation apps available these days are simply amazing. I no longer have to carry a big case full of charts and approach plates. It's all available on my iPad. Plus the location of my airplane is shown right on the chart or approach plate in real time. I can get 15 minute old weather including radar and satellite showing right on the chart. And with the 4G active I get updates in the air as long as I'm not in the mountains too far from a cell tower on the ground. The FAA and airlines have been crazy careful about passengers using cell phones in airliners. I can use my cell connection on my iPad for real time updates while in the air. For aviation usage the iPad is wonderful.That said, I use the iPad at home for reading the NY Times and responding to email. I have a Logitech bluetooth keyboard/cover that perfectly integrates with the iPad. I also use the iPad for displaying textbooks in the Amazon Kindle app. I can use the iPad for a laptop replacement for domestic pleasure trips. But for international travel the iPad is not very useful. For business trips there's no real replacement for a laptop when you need to use PowerPoint to make presentations or work with large spreadsheets or documents. The iPad is for light duty only. And it has no video connection for attaching a projector. HDMI is available using an adapter. But it's not well integrated. I see folks using an iPad for reading a book on an international flight or watching a movie. But a Kindle is much better suited for book reading on long flights. And bigger Android phones work perfectly well for watching movies. Taking an iPad on an international trip where it's a major target for thefts is really not the best idea.This iPad is the best option for what I use it for - aviation. So I can highly recommend getting an iPad for aviation. Make sure you get a WiFi 4G model. The WiFi only models do not have built in GPS.  I've tried the few apps available for aviation on Android. But they are much less capable than the iPad versions and there is really only one app choice - Garmin :Pilot. If you're in the Apple world and need a tablet then the iPad is a logical choice. But if you're in the Android world and don't need aviation apps, then the Galaxy Note 8.0 or the Galaxy Tab Pros are very good tablet choices.

Reviews.Title: Great hardware and iOS, horrible life cycle, will never buy again
Reviews.Author: Jorge D. Salazar "itsmehere"
Reviews.Content: This was my first and last Apple product. It works wonderfully, the screen is beautiful and the apps perform almost flawlessly. What I dislike was 97 days after I bought it they came out with a new model that made mine obsolete instantly. Seven months later the same thing happened and now mine was 2  generations old in les than 10 months. I am not against implementing new advances but Apple knew way before I bought mine that I was buying something that would be obsolete in 11 months and they sold it to me at full price. I can hear their CFO saying: 'another sucker we took money from with an obsolete product sold as if it was the top of the line'. I expect better of the companies I buy expensive hardware from, that if they know what is going to happen just start discounting the current - but soon to be obsolete product -  so the CUSTOMERS would stay loyal. They had me and they lost me. Good luck to them with their bait and switch way of doing business.

The home was burglarized overnight and they took the iPad and some jewelry left on the kitchen sink.  For the police report all I needed was the serial number and GOGC would not help.  I even incentivized and told them if they helped I would re-purchase another one from them but…crickets.I purchased another one but I wouldn't recommend this seller.  Also, I learned if not buying from apple to remember to get tracking tools like PREY once it's arrived.  Thieves know its almost impossible for a buyer to get their apple products back once they been stolen.

Reviews.Author: Bobby Zen "Bobby Zen"
Reviews.Content: This is our first iPad. The new Air is 3 or 4 hundred dollars more than this one was. I think this one is very good buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad 3rd generation
Reviews.Author: Jane Austen "Colorado teacher"
Reviews.Content: Love it-- one of the best purchases that I've ever made.  I've had no regrets even with never versions of the iPad being released.  Mine was the last version that used the 30 pt connector instead of the lightning connector.  Use it every day for email, apps, web surfing and connecting to a Google Drive.

Reviews.Title: He likes it
Reviews.Author: Marcia Horan
Reviews.Content: My husband had wanted a laptop but my son advised me to go with this tablet. We have IPhones so the operating system is familiar and enough memory to keep him happy

Reviews.Title: Cracked screen after 3 weeks of minimal use without any form of abuse to the product
Reviews.Author: Debbie Hughes
Reviews.Content: Within 3 weeks of moderate use (and handling with carefulness) the screen cracked and shattered at the top where you turn on and off.  This was not dropped or abused in any way.  Thankfully Amazon stood behind this purchase.  Again, this cracked with out dropage or any misuse.  I don't believe this was at the fault in any way of the shipper, but after further research appears to be an Apple issue.

Reviews.Title: A great deal
Reviews.Author: byc80
Reviews.Content: Who don't love the ipad? This was a great price. I like everything about the company because they went out of their way to make sure everything was okay with the sale. I would pay anything from this company again without question, I would recommend this product and company. To anyone who is looking for a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Ashley Roseberry
Reviews.Content: Loved it. Great product. Glad that I made the purchase. Thinking about getting one for my fiance, he would love it.

Reviews.Title: The Ipad was just as described perfect shape thanks
Reviews.Author: Bob Houck
Reviews.Content: Looking for ipad for Christmas, the stores all selling first gen ipad for 399.00 , found this 3rd gen for over 100.00 less thanks

Reviews.Title: excellent!
Reviews.Author: Betty
Reviews.Content: the product met my expectation. i bought a used iPad 3 but believe me it came in as if it had never been taken out of the box. it had no sign of wear and tear, its battery life is excellent, its operations are sharp and the microphone is loud. i initially complained about the picture quality but when i checked with my friends that had the same product, it was practically the same and now i am used to it. and concerning the shipping, it came in supper fast(received my package earlier than the estimated date). the only thing is that iPad does not have USB port like some other tablets but with time u find ur way around that, lol. i love my iPad because it has all the features i wanted in a tablet.

Reviews.Title: apple ipad mc705ll/a 3rd gen
Reviews.Author: Master 1
Reviews.Content: I received the ipad as describe and it works great. my son enjoyed it for Christmas and is using it all the time.

Reviews.Title: Apple ipad
Reviews.Author: Sylvia Long
Reviews.Content: I feel the Apple ipad is a great item.  The front and back camera is a plus. It is people friendly and the free apps are a plus

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: EFRAIN O ORTUNO
Reviews.Content: I'd like to have the latest model, but this one is doing everything I've needed so far. I used to want to deal with the other brands of tablets, but after trying other people's ipads I like how a lot of things are easy to do.

Reviews.Title: Battery discharges too fast, I wish I had bought a Galaxy Note 10.1 instead
Reviews.Author: Wajid Hussein
Reviews.Content: I had an iPad 1 and I would charge it once every 2 days but this thing, I got to charge almost everyday. It's crazy. Apart from that, it's just an iPad with no extra customisations available. Such a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 3 Review
Reviews.Author: hbjimbo
Reviews.Content: Love it!!Except it doesn't work on certain printers.  If you want to print, make sure that it communicates with apple products.

Reviews.Title: The charger is broken.
Reviews.Author: Liya Shen "OptimalHealth"
Reviews.Content: I was not able to get iPad fully charged with the charger supplied with the package. I had to buy a new set of charger to fix the problem. It was described as new but failed to mention the problem of the charger. I took me a lot of time to fix the problem. Otherwise, I would have returned the item.

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet
Reviews.Author: J. Hall "Kindle 4me"
Reviews.Content: Most people know that the iPad tablet is the best tablet out on the tech market today.  This tablet was a purchase for my brother, and he loves it, as much as I do mine, it arrived before expected date, and I most definitely would recommend this iPad to anyone, and I'm like a walking testimony, I cannot say any thing bad about the iPad , and  we are very pleased.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY IPAD 3
Reviews.Author: Ossy
Reviews.Content: So far, perfect! So happy with my new ipad 3 64gb it was very well taken care of, no scratches no dents.. simply love it!!

Reviews.Title: Loving my Ipad
Reviews.Author: Nelly
Reviews.Content: was very satisfied with my ipad i purchased. it was in great condition and came with a new case that i didn't even expect to recieve. it even surprised me by how good of a condition it was in. everything looks brand new. I LOVED IT. thank u.

Reviews.Title: Good Tablet
Reviews.Author: J. Hall "Kindle 4me"
Reviews.Content: Most people know that the iPad tablet is the best tablet out on the tech market today.  This tablet was a purchase for my brother, and he loves it, as much as I do mine, it arrived before expected date, and I most definitely would recommend this iPad to anyone, and I'm like a walking testimony, I cannot say any thing bad about the iPad , and  we are very pleased.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY IPAD 3
Reviews.Author: Ossy
Reviews.Content: So far, perfect! So happy with my new ipad 3 64gb it was very well taken care of, no scratches no dents.. simply love it!!

Reviews.Title: Loving my Ipad
Reviews.Author: Nelly
Reviews.Content: was very satisfied with my ipad i purchased. it was in great condition and came with a new case that i didn't even expect to recieve. it even surprised me by how good of a condition it was in. everything looks brand new. I LOVED IT. thank u.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Tsf
Reviews.Content: Great price works perfectly. Totaly meet my expectations.. Love it. Especially with the verizon capability. Would highly recommend . Get one.

Reviews.Title: I was misled.
Reviews.Author: LauraSzyd
Reviews.Content: This ipad was advertised as new but is not. Not only did it not come in the box but it has a nick in the edge. I kept it because being used is ok but this ipad was advertised as new.

Reviews.Title: SOLD ME A PRODUCT THAT WAS DEFECTED AND OUT OF WARRANTY!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: amanda mock
Reviews.Content: I purchased an apple ipad 3 generation .....THAT SHOULD HAVE BEEN NEW!  This is a demo model that was stuck in demo mode and WAS OUT OF THE ONE YEAR WARRANT WITH APPLE...the only option was to pay an additional $300.00 for apple to fix it on top of the 500.00 I GAVE Universal Media Sales to buy it!!!!!  It will not let me do anything!  I have contacted the seller...we will see what they do about this issue!  I am so upset right now I cannot even say!  Lesson learned!

Reviews.Title: iPad is great - experience with Amazon Wholesale not so much
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: Good price, great machine, use it every day.  Took me 2 tries to get the right one.  I purchased one and they sent me an iPad 2 - only found out by accident - even the box said it was a 3.  Of course, by the time I returned it the price had gone up.  Thankfully Amazon gave me some store credit for the difference, but I shouldn't have had the problem to start with.  Almost seemed a little sneaky like they were trying to pass off a 2 at a higher price.

Reviews.Title: My favorite
Reviews.Author: Addie Johnson
Reviews.Content: Love love love!!! I have a desk top computer, laptop and a Kindle.  This IPad is my favorite!! I use it all the time

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: Sam Kaslon
Reviews.Content: I got this iPad as a gift when i first came out and it is still working perfectly. I haven't had a problem with it yet and it is truly a nice piece of hardware. One of the only issues I can point out is the rear facing speaker, but there are ways to fix that.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful!
Reviews.Author: Tracy Mackprang
Reviews.Content: as with all Apple products, this is amazing... and always reliable.  I will never go back to PC's... I tell everyone... no matter what other companies have come up with to try to beat Apple... they never will be able to compete with its efficiency and reliability.

Reviews.Title: we love it
Reviews.Author: henry riddle
Reviews.Content: Decided i would try getting a used ipad after being a little hesitant.  I recieved the ipad in about a week after ordering it. everything was there and we love it so far .

Reviews.Title: a great purchase for me
Reviews.Author: keith
Reviews.Content: Beautiful!!  No problems.  Works like a dream.  Very happy with this purchase.  Continuing to keep me satisfied.  Will continure to shop here.

Reviews.Title: Awesome seller Awesome product
Reviews.Author: Martin
Reviews.Content: Great product and very fast shipping!! It even came with a red case! Although I would have appreciated that the seller had mentioned that it had engraving in the back. But other than that it is an awesome iPad!

Reviews.Title: Love this thing
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Amazing little tablet. Writing this review on it right now. Bigger than the previous gen but still very portable.Quality is superb. It's an Apple, what else needs to be said.

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Donald Roy Camper
Reviews.Content: It was a brand new tablet like I wanted The price was fair I would recommend anybody to shop with Amazon

Reviews.Title: iPad is dead... RIP...
Reviews.Author: Belgin
Reviews.Content: I ordered this item on September 13, 2013 and I gave it 5/5. My son loved it so much. Last Saturday (November 16,2013), this is approximately 2 months after we received the item, it stopped working. Didn't respond to all our attempts to turn it on. We took it to Apple store and their diagnose was : Fluid leak and dock corrosion. the iPad is dead basically. My son was very careful with it, using it daily at home for an hour after the school. Sorry guys but I need to change my rating : 1/5

Reviews.Title: Prized possession
Reviews.Author: Ashis Banerjee
Reviews.Content: It's an iPad. Of course I love it. If you are an apple person go for it. You must own one.

Reviews.Title: Lousy requirement, - Itunes.
Reviews.Author: YouReview
Reviews.Content: I own this IPad and also a Samsung Note, The BIG drawback with this IPad and any for that matter is the proprietary iTunes software which must be used.  It is updated regularly, and MUST be downloaded to interact wit the IPad, otherwise you will get an incompatibility error.  Then it presents a "War and Peace" sized new and different agreement requirement. So you have to agree to something different each time.  After a while, you really don't know what you've agreed to.

Reviews.Title: Great ipads
Reviews.Author: Ariel Lehman
Reviews.Content: its wonderful got it and its like brand new :) even came with a case and screen protection and shipped fast

Reviews.Title: Ipad apple
Reviews.Author: Diane Ashley
Reviews.Content: Ipad in good condition but sent wrong charger. Had to buy a new charge at my expense. It was suppose to com with charger but it was for a 4S iphone.

Reviews.Title: Ipad apple
Reviews.Author: Diane Ashley
Reviews.Content: Ipad in good condition but sent wrong charger. Had to buy a new charge at my expense. It was suppose to com with charger but it was for a 4S iphone.

Reviews.Title: IPad 3
Reviews.Author: Matthew
Reviews.Content: Excellent performance, it looked as if it had never been used when I got it. It does everything I expected it to do. The black and gray color really goes well with all my device accessories which looks pretty sleek.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Ipad
Reviews.Author: James F.
Reviews.Content: Its just what I wanted.  Excellent shape - no scratches.  Looks like new.  Fast delivery and it was just what the description said it would be

Reviews.Title: Seller advertised iPad as new- 1 Year Warranty expired  3 months ago
Reviews.Author: John B. Mooney
Reviews.Content: Cellular Data stopped working. After numerous attempts to solve with ATT finally brought it into an Apple Store.Apple Tech informed me it was hardware issue and would have to be replaced. No problem, I just got this 3 months ago, iPads have a 1 year limited warrantyTurns out the warranty EXPIRED June 1st 2013., 2 months before I bought it, and the seller completely failed to include that very important bit of information.Nice.

Reviews.Title: Everything I Need for Work and Play
Reviews.Author: TheGreen
Reviews.Content: This device is amazing!  It replaces my need for a smart phone.  I love the GPS as I am directionally challenged, and do a lot of driving for my job as a private tutor.  I also love the ability to check and respond to emails while on the road.  Additionally, there are so many apps that help me stay organized and productive with my mobile office.  It's also great for when I need a break from work.

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My son got this for Christmas last year and loves it. He uses it for everything. Seems to be really relable and in his hands non breakable.

Reviews.Title: Hearts desired fullfilled
Reviews.Author: bathsheba obanner "Queenob1"
Reviews.Content: Loving it�I recommend this produt to all, ordering is quick, fast and in a hurry. I give it give plus stars

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: ddp
Reviews.Content: Great product. Easy to use. Great display, sharp, vivid colors. LTE built in works great. Apps are plentiful and a lot are no cost.

Reviews.Title: I'm very happy with this device
Reviews.Author: S. Kolbe
Reviews.Content: It works good, is helpful  and i use it very often. I would choose it a second time. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Heather Slappey Culpepper
Reviews.Content: Love it! Delivered as expected @ a great price! Daughter likes to play games & I look @ weather & internet. Lots of fun!

Reviews.Title: Wedding Gift
Reviews.Author: JAG "Jag"
Reviews.Content: Great buy and product. It's easy to use and the apps and iTunes are a plus. Good entertainment device. Love it.

Reviews.Title: Very satisfied
Reviews.Author: F.M.
Reviews.Content: The IPAD came in two days and I was very pleased with the product.  I have only had it a day now and am trying to put it through it's paces as you have 14 days to return.  I don't think it's going to come to that.  F.M.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Jose Carlos Alvarado Pena
Reviews.Content: I loved the iPad 3 Wifi version but I got to a point where I really depended on it more than my iPhone or than my computer when I wasn't in my house, so I decided to get the Cellular version. Wow it is just awesome. Now I get 4G LTE in my area and it is awesome I can be in the park or any where else and I can still use my iPad. I love it!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Jocelynn Y. Cooper "media freak"
Reviews.Content: Just another great Apple product. I was completely satisfied with it. All it needed was a case to protect it. Perfect.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Aliyyah Bowers
Reviews.Content: I use this item for everything.  APple is great, the device is sturdy and as expected.  I have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: It is a big iphone
Reviews.Author: Patricia Galvao Riccioppo Isidoro
Reviews.Content: I liked a lot. The battery works well. It is a little bit heavy. Now I think I should have bought the small one. But the ipad is great for the ones used to itunes.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Robert E Lee
Reviews.Content: Product arrived on time and was packaged very securely.  This was my second IPad and I was just as pleased with the newer version as the older one.  I use it for everything from grocery lists, to email and web surfing.  A great tool to help keep your life more organized.  I do see people without a cover,however, I highly recommend a good cover with the magnetic turn off when closed feature.  I recommend this product.  Apple products have been a change in my technical life that is better than I even imagined.

Reviews.Title: Good machine....
Reviews.Author: Eldwin
Reviews.Content: Despite slow in showing the photos, the machine is efficient.  Good enough for work applications.  Long life battery too, I only charge every 2-3 days.

Reviews.Title: The great distractor
Reviews.Author: Dinah F Lewis
Reviews.Content: With this ipad you can get lost for hours, playing card, reading book, searching the internet and doing many things to while away the hours, when you could be swimming and /or cooking, or cleaning house, washing the car.Great product for some uses.  Good thing you have to charge the batteries once in a while, or nothing would get done.Oh, the camera is excelltent and face time s awesome.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!  - Excellent buy!
Reviews.Author: B. Love
Reviews.Content: Got the new iPad 3 and works flawlessly..  Actions are very smooth, graphics are top notch!  Love the retina display.. The wireless works excellent as well. Well worth the price we paid.  There are also lots of great convenience features with gestures, great application performance on various 3D games etc.  Couldn't be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: Good machine....
Reviews.Author: Eldwin
Reviews.Content: Despite slow in showing the photos, the machine is efficient.  Good enough for work applications.  Long life battery too, I only charge every 2-3 days.

Reviews.Title: The great distractor
Reviews.Author: Dinah F Lewis
Reviews.Content: With this ipad you can get lost for hours, playing card, reading book, searching the internet and doing many things to while away the hours, when you could be swimming and /or cooking, or cleaning house, washing the car.Great product for some uses.  Good thing you have to charge the batteries once in a while, or nothing would get done.Oh, the camera is excelltent and face time s awesome.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!  - Excellent buy!
Reviews.Author: B. Love
Reviews.Content: Got the new iPad 3 and works flawlessly..  Actions are very smooth, graphics are top notch!  Love the retina display.. The wireless works excellent as well. Well worth the price we paid.  There are also lots of great convenience features with gestures, great application performance on various 3D games etc.  Couldn't be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product  This Product is the same as i hope. i am very happy with the product I will  recommend it.
Reviews.Author: Victor Ferreri
Reviews.Content: Excellent Product  This Product is the same as i hope. i am very happy with the product I will  recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Like NEW
Reviews.Author: HAKWOO KIM
Reviews.Content: For that I haven't used a lot, it could feel that it was in a quite good condition. I felt like I got a new one. I'll have to see with more time and use, but so far, no problem.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Thu
Reviews.Content: It's OK, but the posting does not tell me if it is 4th or 3rd generation. Anyway, it is better if it is unlocked

Reviews.Title: KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK OF BRING THE ITEMS TO THE PEOPLE.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS IPAD3 I USE IT EVERY DAY I HAVE THE BIBLE ON IT AND I USE IT IN CHURCH ON SUNDAY.THANK YOU.

Reviews.Title: Great alternative for an expensive GPS and in general just nice device
Reviews.Author: T. Wynia "twvette"
Reviews.Content: I use mine in a portfolio case for work and then in a LifeProof waterproof case for use in an offroad vehicle for GPS with no phone signal. Make s a huge GPS display much larger than even very expensive Lowrance or similar systems. Use RAM mounts for any mounting needed. Many apps for GPS ... works great deep in the forest. Fair battery life.

Reviews.Title: After 1 and 1/2 years, the Ipad is still working
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: I am an Android guy but I have to say that the Ipad  3rd generation) is very impressive.  I first bought this when it first came out which was about a year and half ago and it is still working.  I am not experiencing any lag or freezing issues that I would with an Android tablet.  Yes, I recently bought the Nexus 7 (2nd generation) tablet but I was really disappointed.  I had lag and freezing issues with the Nexus tablet.  I have to say my Ipad is reliable and I still use it.I just wish there were better integration with Google services such as Google Music..

Reviews.Title: Wonderful Tablet
Reviews.Author: Chance W
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 3rd Gen version after seeing it used in other places. I didn't have to have the latest and greatest and this serves me well just fine. Waiting on the iOS 7 update to come out soon. Works great as a hot spot also when needed.

Reviews.Title: Good!
Reviews.Author: Dionicio E Barroso L.
Reviews.Content: Good Product! fulfilled with my expectations and the shipping was fast..I recommend it for anyone who does not know that table buy

Reviews.Title: Was not disappointed.
Reviews.Author: Walter J. Bargen
Reviews.Content: Was not disappointed.I anxiously awaited the arrival of my 3rd Geneeration Ipad and was not disappointed when it arrived.

Reviews.Title: Apple Baby!
Reviews.Author: Alana Williams
Reviews.Content: product came safely in the time expected. there were no issues with product itself met my expectations.  However, if you plan on watching a whole lot of Netflix etc battery may last a long time but takes equal amount of time to charge up again :(.  Still a excellent Product!

Reviews.Title: Over heats
Reviews.Author: Danielle R Reiser
Reviews.Content: Wasn't pleased with the product I received.  I usually purchase direct from apple, but the price led me in this direction.  I should have known that hen something is too good to be true it usually is a poor decision.  Buy direct is my advise.

Reviews.Title: Bought for Wife
Reviews.Author: Jerry W. Rapp
Reviews.Content: I bought this for wife so I could get mine back. What can I say, I got mine back , she loves hers.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Lynn Daigle
Reviews.Content: My iPad arrived before I expected it, which was great.  I was very happy with the quality of it since I purchased it used.  It was in better shape then what I expected.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT tool!
Reviews.Author: Rick Smith
Reviews.Content: I was never an Apple user or advocate, I used all Windows-based PC devices.  My friend convinced me to buy an iPad, and since then, my Windows-based laptop (which was less than a year old) has now become obsolete.  I can do ALL the same things as my laptop just as quickly, but with less weight and higher portability.  Windows based devices will always have their place, but this Apple device is just plain AWESOME!  LOVE IT!!

Reviews.Title: Very nice used product.
Reviews.Author: Darrin
Reviews.Content: Very good shape, works great and connects wifi very easily and quickly. This item does however charge very slowly weather it's plugged into USB or wall charger. I don't know if that is the nature of this beast or not as my son'd is the next gen up from this and his charges rather quickly. Overall, very good product, very good packaging and very good seller.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Nathan D.
Reviews.Content: This product works great. It met all my needs and expectations. It does what it is said to do and even more.

Reviews.Title: A superb communication device
Reviews.Author: John Houser
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad.  It is an amazing communication device.  Am also using it to brush up on my Spanish.

Reviews.Title: Bought for Wife
Reviews.Author: Jerry W. Rapp
Reviews.Content: I bought this for wife so I could get mine back. What can I say, I got mine back , she loves hers.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Lynn Daigle
Reviews.Content: My iPad arrived before I expected it, which was great.  I was very happy with the quality of it since I purchased it used.  It was in better shape then what I expected.

Reviews.Content: I was never an Apple user or advocate, I used all Windows-based PC devices. I don't know if that is the nature of this beast or not as my son'd is the next gen up from this and his charges rather quickly. Overall, very good product, very good packaging and very good seller.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Nathan D.
Reviews.Content: This product works great. It met all my needs and expectations. It does what it is said to do and even more.

Reviews.Title: A superb communication device
Reviews.Author: John Houser
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad.  It is an amazing communication device.  Am also using it to brush up on my Spanish.

Reviews.Title: Better then I expected
Reviews.Author: Daniel G.
Reviews.Content: Just received my used ipad 3 and it was like new with no scratches, dents, or cracks. It was only the ipad and charger and it was will package. The only problem I had was the shipping from FedEx. They never showed up to my house and would report as I was not home when I was so I requested that it be held at a fedex location. I was a little nervous that I would receive the wrong ipad but ezcorp sent the right one.

Reviews.Title: Very , very nice
Reviews.Author: Doreen Jeanneret
Reviews.Content: I purchased this , not a new generation but after reading the reviews it would serve me best. great cost, great name, perfect customer service. So thank you this is really fun to have and use.

Reviews.Title: loving my iPad 3
Reviews.Author: Nicole Woolery
Reviews.Content: useful. handy. neat. downloads faster than my laptop. great for Skype calls. would recommend. now I am addicted to my iPad3.

Reviews.Title: never without it
Reviews.Author: Breezy Elaine
Reviews.Content: quick compact I take it everywhere visuals are great and I can talk on Skype giving me AUDIO and VISIUAL as I talk.I can store information like tickets for flights receipts for products codes for accounts appointments take pictures videos musicgrocery list and more you decide.

Reviews.Title: Great iPad
Reviews.Author: Luca
Reviews.Content: This is my first apple product. I used iphones, but didn't use iPad before. Great purchase. Would recommend it to anyone

Reviews.Title: Apple iPad MD329LL/A (32GB, Wi-Fi, White) 3rd Generation
Reviews.Author: Arthur
Reviews.Content: thanks for the Apple iPad MD329LL/A (32GB, Wi-Fi, White) 3rd Generation.it steal running to this day.and it true to the info.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Michele Schneider
Reviews.Content: I enjoy using the iPad 3 it is a wonderful as is efficient to use.  Also, it is portable and reliable.

Reviews.Title: I am apple addicted
Reviews.Author: Stan
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 8 year old son.  Locked it down through the restrictions in the IOS and it it great.  Paired it with an Apple Airport Extreme 5.0ghz router and it flies.  16 gig is plenty of space IF you have a home Itunes server with your movies and audio on it.  IF you intend on loading it up with videos, it will fill fast.  Facetime is awesome as the kids can facetime grandma instead of visiting, Ah-HA!  Worth the price right there.  The Ipad will make your life easier with the internet and personal stuff- email, video, etc.  You will love it.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Philip Varghese
Reviews.Content: Wonderful device! Price was right and the delivery was on time. The retina display is sooooo clear!Now I need to download some apps.

Reviews.Title: Apple
Reviews.Author: AndresR
Reviews.Content: Apple Ipad is nice, i recomended, but the new version it's better.Take your time for chose the best item that fou need

Reviews.Title: My most excited purchase ever!
Reviews.Author: Phuong Kim Nguyen
Reviews.Content: I bought this Ipad 3 for myself after my son hogged the ipad 3 16G I shared with him.  I was so so excited when I completed the purchase and anxiously waited for my ipad to come.  I give the seller 5 stars because he/she deserves it. Not only the ipad's condition was like new, just as the seller stated it was, the shipping was the quickest as can be. Thank you, Thornbird (the seller). I'm a very satisfied customer.

Reviews.Title: Great, except sound
Reviews.Author: VJohnson
Reviews.Content: The iPad is great.  However, the sound is kind of rough.  We had been wanting one for a long time and altogether we are very satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: My son loves it!
Reviews.Author: BEVERLY TAYLOR
Reviews.Content: Had it for 3 weeks now, bought it for my son it's been great for his tutoring classes!  He loves it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Mischief
Reviews.Content: This product works as good as new.  It's truly amazing and works like a charm.  This is one the best gifts to myself I ever gave.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: SanJose
Reviews.Content: As mentioned like new, no scratch found just like new, except the box look a little old, other than that every things are fine.

Reviews.Title: good codition
Reviews.Author: Delleon
Reviews.Content: I was worried about buying a product like this online, because I thought it wouldn't be in a good condition coming from an online department and that it might be damage through delivery. But the product was fine, I had no problems with it at all; just as if I would have bought it in a retail store.

Reviews.Title: Excellence
Reviews.Author: Shaw Barnes
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad, using it right now!  You cannot go wrong with an iPad.  We replaced our laptop with it and I couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Control Platform
Reviews.Author: Doug Freeman
Reviews.Content: Use it everyday in every way.  Especially like it for controlling the house with a VeraLite z wave system.  My favorite tablet.

Reviews.Title: great purchase
Reviews.Author: Nucita
Reviews.Content: I love it is just like described. Great purchase. Got in on time for my Mom's birthday. Thank you much

Reviews.Title: I'm so happy!!!
Reviews.Author: Alvinie
Reviews.Content: The price, product, and customer service was great!!! They were so helpful in answering any questions I had and it was shipped to within 2 days after I purchased it. I'll be buying a mini and an iPad 4 from you guys in the near future. Thanks!!!

Reviews.Title: a over all impressive experience...
Reviews.Author: Glenda H.
Reviews.Content: The iPad came early and was in great condition...it was everything I wanted....very happy!  This was the first time I purchased on Amazon, but I will do it again..

Reviews.Title: iPad, 3rd generation.  It was perfect.
Reviews.Author: Jacque Sumler
Reviews.Content: I love my iPad.  This one has 64 gb of memory so I can put all my music and some movies on it.  It is so nice not to have to boot up a computer for information such as the weather, email, Pinterest, etc.

Reviews.Title: Such a handy piece of technology.
Reviews.Author: Jessie May Campbell "birkgirl"
Reviews.Content: I did quite a bit of research before purchasing this iPad.  I am really happy with the model and gigabytes I chose.  This refurbished iPad was sealed up, in excellent condition and free of problems.

Reviews.Title: Love this ipad
Reviews.Author: Carol Saltares
Reviews.Content: Love, Love this ipad. Like new works well I would buy this item again i have no complaine with it, came on time.

Reviews.Title: Great brand new iPad
Reviews.Author: Puneet C.
Reviews.Content: As soon as I received the iPad, I cross-checked it's status on the Apple website and it came out to be a brand new iPad.Hats off to the seller for selling real and authentic stuff in the online market. It's because of sellers like this that people still continue to have trust in online shopping.I have been using iPad since past 1 week and everything seems to be working fine till now.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Baye
Reviews.Content: The item met my expectations and is working fine. It is very fine and working very fine without any issue. Good deal.

Reviews.Title: LOVE MY IPAD
Reviews.Author: Sjm
Reviews.Content: Love it!  Big enough to read and small enough to carry in my purse. Great for my granddaughter at the restaurant. Keeps her busy.

Reviews.Title: Satisfactory to a point
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Wimberly
Reviews.Content: After using Microsoft products for years, using a MAC product is a bit challenging.  I still need to download the user's manual to fully understand the Ipad.  I find that it's not intuitive - at least not for me.  I was a bit dismayed that there was no connection on the Ipad for a flash drive.  I guess I'll get used to it I suppose.

Reviews.Title: It's Fun!!!!
Reviews.Author: Care
Reviews.Content: The iPad is like having a computer in your hands without the mouse and no click and drag!!!  You will love it, wish I could afford two son I don't have to share!!!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: Jane50
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPad and I am definitely happy with the product.  I not only like it because you can find some many applications for it but, it works great.  The resolution is awesome.  I own a android tablet and it works good but not as good as this.  Yes, it is a little more expensive but I guess you get what you pay for.  So far I have had no problems.  I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: I Pad 3rd Gen
Reviews.Author: jeffgrass
Reviews.Content: Wanted a Ipad since they were introduced.  I love it and use it everyday. No better tablet even  comes close in my option.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Ashton P. Johnson "Zepaw"
Reviews.Content: Oh iPad, how I love you. A fantastic multi-purpose device. It was already a strong product but when they added the high quality display it became a must own piece of hardware. Movies, comics, tooling around online, etc.

Reviews.Content: It is a good tablet. Use it as my laptop. In fact I'm writing this review with my iPad right now! This is a go to if you are going to buy the iPad as your first tablet. If you are coming from a 2, I recommend to get the iPad with retina display.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Ashton P. Johnson "Zepaw"

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: Norm
Reviews.Content: I pondered this for 2 years then finally bought one, but 2 weeks early because the 128Gb version is out now.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Nancy Mae Jones
Reviews.Content: I t arrived on time everything was wonderful!!!!  I have already used it more than I did my laptop and my husband even likes it......

Reviews.Title: Does everything I ....
Reviews.Author: Richard G. Brown
Reviews.Content: Does everything I need it to do beside become something other than an apple product.  I bought this as a work device.  Not into apple personally.

Reviews.Title: Awesome service
Reviews.Author: Luis Abraham Lozada López
Reviews.Content: I'll do business with these guys again without thinking twice. i got the Product on time and it was as mentioned, Pristine!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Buyer231
Reviews.Content: Fast picture taking, good camera, retina display, good memory . Overall it's a productive product. iPad 3G is worth it!

Reviews.Title: Awesomeness
Reviews.Author: KaeDiddy
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing product, and I would tell everyone I know that want's a quick and portable piece of tech to go and get one. You don't know what your missing out on until you have one.

Reviews.Title: Apple IPad
Reviews.Author: Kenny Crutcher
Reviews.Content: This is my second Apple product.  I think the iPad is a great tool and toy.Shipment was great it actually arrived four days prior to the scheduled date.

Reviews.Title: Amazingly Just As Described.
Reviews.Author: Lady Dee
Reviews.Content: I received my item within 2 days of my order, which I thought was very nice, the item is exactly as described, it is FLAWLESS with a sort of deep mark on the back, which is okay because it will always be cased anyway. I would of given it a 5 star, but I don't like the fact the I got the small charger which take 4ever to charge and I don't think that they are original APPLE PRODUCT. But so far its working good, and it was kept in exceptional condition.

Reviews.Title: Great product - I highly recommend
Reviews.Author: Faye Hollidaye "Faye"
Reviews.Content: I've had older models of this item, and this is the best one yet. I didn't think I needed a camera, but it comes in handy and is very nice. And the improvement in the quality of picture and video is definitely noticeable. Voice-to-text works well, way better than I expected, since you can select which dialect you speak so it'll understand you. I love this and I recommend it to anyone who's in need of an electronic personal assistant, a personal free-games device, or a portable movie-streaming machine - I've known it to be great at being all of these things.

Reviews.Title: Super satisfied
Reviews.Author: Clauycha
Reviews.Content: Excelent choice and awesome item, I recomend you get this item for you or for a gift; u will be 100% satisfied

Reviews.Title: Very handy and convenient.
Reviews.Author: Mike Adriano
Reviews.Content: It is so much easier than a laptop to tote and use when traveling. The thing that I don't like is that it doesn't work with adobe flash player, though I have been able to live without it.  I use it practically every day in some form, if just listening to the music that is stored on it or an internet radio app. There are plenty of apps to choose from both free and pay for. The battery life is amazing. I can use it for short periods of times throughout the day and not have to recharge for days. The picture quality is excellent, but I would have liked stereo speakers over the mono speaker.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Hope
Reviews.Content: The quality of this product has lived up to amazon's ranking standards, down to the plastic still wrapped around the charger-literally 'like new'. I'm loving it!

Reviews.Title: A gift horse
Reviews.Author: Seymour
Reviews.Content: My friend lets me use the 32GB 3rd gen iPad they gave her with her job, because she doesn't care for it. I could point out its one or two flaws, but that would be ungrateful. Instead, I will say that the iPad has allowed me to ditch Verizon because now I can call with my free MagicJack app from any cafe in town, at friends' houses, and from the wifi in my studio. It's interesting the way a PC gives you more freedom of choice with modular components, while almost literally anchoring you to a monthly DSL bill (now a more bloated cable or FiOS bill), while the iPad is the opposite; a greedy control freak who lets you do whatever you want for free if you're clever. All things considered, the iPad is fun technology, and Apple does it well.

Reviews.Title: My wife's favorite
Reviews.Author: Nevadawx
Reviews.Content: She needed an iPad for work so I got this one for her.  She totally loves this. She likes the ease of use and is now a big Apple fan.

Reviews.Title: A must have for work
Reviews.Author: Jmewhort "Interested reader"
Reviews.Content: I love this! I struggled with buying an Ipad or android device. I discovered that the iPad is far more versatile for my work applications so that is what I purchased. I have no regrets because it is great all on its own. I should have known since my iPod classic runs a very close second as my favorite electronic device!

Reviews.Title: Apple Ipad 3rd Generation
Reviews.Author: Diego
Reviews.Content: I love this product because all apple things are 10 points.The only problem I had is that the charge doesn't work.I don't know how can I could recieve a charge that works.Regards,Diego.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Doc
Reviews.Content: Great product!!! Highly recommend to everyone. Wasn't sure what the quality of the product was going to be, considering the price, but I love my new iPad.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Campos
Reviews.Content: All around great piece of equipment.  Love my IPad love my apps, have a nook and have use windows 8 tabs and this is still the easiest most functional out of all of them.

Reviews.Title: This is what tablet should be
Reviews.Author: Mariusz Gorzoch
Reviews.Content: I'm an user of IPad 2 and also use of that model and I need to say they do what tablets should do. It easy to use and designed having end-user in mind. Everything is simple and designed to let you focus on things you want to do. I also have a chance to use Android tablets as also Windows 8 tablets (in general I'm an Microsoft guy) and I need to say that IPad left other device far in behind.

Reviews.Title: ipad 3
Reviews.Author: Punkin
Reviews.Content: Really do like this new toy; still figuring out how to do stuff with it and I'm definitley not a tech-head so there's a bit of hunting and experiementing involved.

Reviews.Title: Cord needed
Reviews.Author: Jennie
Reviews.Content: Needed a new power cord as the cord was not the APPLE cord which should have come with it, but it was no problem purchasing a new one.

Reviews.Title: I Pad 3
Reviews.Author: R. W. "Loves Books & Music"
Reviews.Content: My first I Pad--love it-- has the ATT option so I can use it where there is no Wi Fi such as in the auto-- or ANYWHERE that a cell phone can get a .signal.  Has tremendous "HD" type picture quaity-- takes great photos/ will be able to skype on it--- better than a lap top and very portable and light. Still learning ALL the capabilities of this product!

Reviews.Title: Best tablet on the market, perfect for beginners
Reviews.Author: doughie_boy
Reviews.Content: Short and simple review. Great step up from ipad 1 and 2, i see no reason why you need to buy a ipad 4. This is just as good.Pros:-retina screen makes everything clear and sharp-easy to use OS compared to android-perfect for beginners-rich set of apps on the market-nice build quality (dropped mine twice on concrete and it still goes)-great resale value-plenty of 3rd party accessories for dirt cheapCons:-gets warm/hot during use-takes 6+ hours to recharge-more expensive compared to other tablets

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Jaymeson
Reviews.Content: Very nice product. We already had one so this is our second one. They do a lot of work for us as well as let us have fun. They are pretty quick with a good connection. If just using your network, they are slower but still faster than working on a  server at work, per-say. I would suggest this to anyone on a budget and realizes the Apple 4 is way over priced right now!

Reviews.Title: ipad
Reviews.Author: william
Reviews.Content: el producto cumplio con mis requerimientos y lo recomiendo a todo el publico en general. muy satisfecho en pocas palabras

Reviews.Title: Love this IPAD - having so much fun with it!!
Reviews.Author: RAch
Reviews.Content: The screen is great, it is fast, the Apps are great and the quality is brilliant so all in all loving it!

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Edgar Naranjo
Reviews.Content: is perfect. it is what i was looking for. i got it just in time so everything is fine. thanks

Reviews.Title: Fast and awesome
Reviews.Author: M. Mai
Reviews.Content: I got this iPad about 3 weeks and I love it.  A lot faster on the Internet than iPad 1 & 2 I guess the processor are faster and newer.  The screen is much, much better compare to iPad 1 & 2 side by side...retina display is crystal clear in HD.  The only cons I guess is the iPad itself is a little hot after a long period of use.  Other than that the iPad is really great

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Carla
Reviews.Content: Apple is a known brand so I can say something different than most of the people know. Is is an excellent product. the only thing that is not so good or may be I didn't find the way how to do it is the camera which has a very low resolution

Reviews.Title: Love it (and I'm a hybrid user)
Reviews.Author: Throwdown
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure how much I'd like the iPad 3rd Generation as I am a devout Android phone user. Having said that I also own and use a MacBook Pro and iMac daily. Love how easy it is to use any app I load on this. Performance has been flawless and I don't regret not getting one that uses a phone carrier for data. If I don't have Wi-Fi available where I'm at, I simply fire up a Wi-Fi hotspot on my Samsung Galaxy S III and I'm good to go.Consider some type of flip case an essential accessory!

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Simah
Reviews.Content: I would have appreciated that somewhere in the description, you would have stated that this iPad did not have the internal guts to be hooked up to a cell phone plan. Sine it was supposedly the latest and greatest I was surprised to get to Verizon only to find out I couldn't put it on my phone plan. You need to write script for those of us who are somewhat lacking in computer skills but are trying...

Reviews.Title: great item
Reviews.Author: B. tyminski
Reviews.Content: very satisfied with the ipad. it is a little heavier than i realize it would be.I would certainly recommend to a friend.

Reviews.Title: I-pad
Reviews.Author: julie sigler
Reviews.Content: Love my I-pad. Don"t know why I waited so long to get one or how I lived without it. I use it everyday.

Reviews.Title: Changed my life
Reviews.Author: Roxanne
Reviews.Content: Although disappointed when I realized there was actually an Ipad 4, i kept the 3rd generation anyway. No complaints. Love it and use it throughout the day.

Reviews.Title: Light, and fast
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife and she loves it. Much faster startup than her old laptop. Great for email and web surfing

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: L. Deister
Reviews.Content: I love my ipad. Can't stand to be without it. The best thing since sliced bread. Entertaining and so much fun

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Robert Mann "History Guy"
Reviews.Content: Trouble Free.  Use a couple of hours a day...news, entertainment, etc.  Great when on the road.  I may buy another.

Reviews.Title: Ipad summary

Reviews.Content: This thing is awesome. I would defiantly recommend this to anyone wanting an easy to use tablet at a great price. You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: great gift
Reviews.Author: Jayesco
Reviews.Content: purchased for a gift for a donor and they loved it.  great product.am will purchase one for myself in the near future

Reviews.Title: Apple wins again
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love that i can take my library with me,my bible study tools with me and fits easily into my purse.I wanted a bigger size than the mini and love it, the ease with which apple products work is amazing, compared to android. I will always choose apple over any other.

Reviews.Title: iPad
Reviews.Author: Diana
Reviews.Content: This Item was stolen in Venezuelan airport of Maiquetia....so I could't have my beautiful iPad in my hands. I am very sad for this.

Reviews.Title: Its very good.
Reviews.Author: CHARLES KOTZER
Reviews.Content: Hello. Everything arrived fine. I would like to know about the warranty. I live in Venezuela, and the ipad work with 3g  any carrier. Which is fine

Reviews.Title: iPad 3
Reviews.Author: chris fiordeliso
Reviews.Content: What do I need to say. Anyone who has one knows!  Beware this product can become addicting. Before you know you'll be buying one for the whole family.

Reviews.Title: Apple iPAD
Reviews.Author: Evelyn J. Russell
Reviews.Content: Excellent product!  It was a gift formy husband and he can't keep hishands off it...smileArrived on time and in excellent condition!

Reviews.Title: No es lo que esperaba...
Reviews.Author: Luis Eduardo Farias Rosas
Reviews.Content: Y me refiero a que en ningún lugar de la publicación dice que el iPad es refurbished. Debería exigirse al vendedor publicar esa condición.

Reviews.Content: Propably the retina iPad has better WiFi but my wife old samsung galaxy 10.1 has much better WiFi than ipad 3. That is disappointig.

Reviews.Title: Just exactly what I expected.
Reviews.Author: Jerry M. Clemons "Cutigers"
Reviews.Content: Works well as expected for Apple Products.I find it difficult to close open apps.Maybe my fingers are to big or I just don,t know how to touch the little icons.

Reviews.Title: LOVE
Reviews.Author: dawn wimer
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY IPAD, I WOULDNT CHANGE IT FOR ANYTHING, AND THE PLUS SIDE I CAN TAKE IT ON TRIPS WITH ME AND WATCH TV ON IT

Reviews.Title: Ipad 3rd generation WiFi
Reviews.Author: Nancy
Reviews.Content: It still has Google maps!  It's an iPad. What more do I have to say. I had to write this much to publish the review.

Reviews.Title: Loving It
Reviews.Author: Judy G Eckert "Icepirate"
Reviews.Content: Wonderful tool it's nice to be able to carry your computer from the couch to the table or wherever you like

Reviews.Title: iPad 3 has all we need
Reviews.Author: dan
Reviews.Content: I chose an iPad 3 because unlike the iPad 2 it has Retina display and unlike the 4th generation it doesn't have the lightning cord.This iPad works as well as it should.

Reviews.Title: Great apple product!
Reviews.Author: heather
Reviews.Content: I purchased my iPad 3 today after spending countless hours stealing my husbands to use.... He has the 4 though.... Honestly if you do not use Siri save your money and grab the iPad 3 instead.... The retina display is gorgeous and this tablet is a breeze to use! There are no directions but apple products are so user friendly that anyone can quickly pick it up. The iPad itself is a tad heavier than I expected but that's my only complaint. Buy it elsewhere than amazon. I paid 400 for mine.

Reviews.Title: Back to Apple
Reviews.Author: PapaHop
Reviews.Content: The problems that we put up with windows are all but gone. We started with an Apple IIe long agon but chamged to dos/winndows because of work. Should have stayed with Apple at home!! Great to have.

Reviews.Title: perfect.
Reviews.Author: maralvan
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my nice and she is really enjoying it.I deffinitely recommend it to anyone who likes electronics.

Reviews.Title: It's an Ipad, you know you want it
Reviews.Author: Madasser "madasser"
Reviews.Content: Bought for my wife for Christmas.  Works great, her nose is buried in it all the time.  Peace and quite finally, guys get this for your wife/girlfriend.  It will shut her up and get her out of your hair, for a little while anyways.  I'm just funning ladies.  It's an Apple product, it works great, does what its supposed to.  If you don't know what an Ipad is or does by now you need to read more than an Amazon review about it.  My only gripe is that Apple, unbeknownst to me (and I thought I kept on top of tech stuff) Apple upgraded the processor in the Ipad 3 and started calling it the Ipad 4.  I told someone at work I bought the wife an Ipad and was asked if it was the 3 or 4.  I coudn't beleive Apple had the balls to do that with out a major release.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: NikNix
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my husband and he loves it! He hasn't put it down since since he got it.

Reviews.Title: iPad 3rd generation
Reviews.Author: Jemmy
Reviews.Content: It's my first iPad. The product is exactly what the online specifications showed. I am quite pleased with it. Also got a great bargain on it.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: mgraham4fx "mg"
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my wife for Christmas.  She is working out how to use it in here daily routine.  It's a powerful tool to stay informed and connected.

Reviews.Title: Ipad 3
Reviews.Author: Karla Glover
Reviews.Content: The applle Ipad is great conditon. This was a great buy!!! I would recommend this company as a excellent saler.

Reviews.Title: Used/ Bought New
Reviews.Author: d sollenberger
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed in the Crawford Superstore in posting this item as a New I Pad and priced it as such, but sent out a used product.

Reviews.Title: APPLE IPAD
Reviews.Author: Irene Hernandez
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY APPLE IPAD I AM STILL LEARNING EVERYTHING ABOUT IT BUT I LOVE IT MY PICTURES COME OUT FABULOUS

Reviews.Title: Retina!!
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: Best part of this is the amazng retina display. I contemplated between the ipad 2 and this model for a while before making the decision to get this one...Im glad I did.

Reviews.Title: The only computer I usually use now...
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: I can't believe how much I can do with it.  Sure, it doesn't replace my desktop, but I find myself at the desktop maybe 20 percent of the time now.  Quick, intuitive, and fun!

Reviews.Title: Great Present
Reviews.Author: Jeff Calvin
Reviews.Content: Got this for my wife as present, easy product to use and do the things you can do with an IPAD.

Reviews.Title: Another awesome Apple product
Reviews.Author: Derrick
Reviews.Content: I'm not an Apple fanatic, but I love everything about the iPad.  I don't spend much time on my home computer anymore, so it's a real time saver.  It also has a great display and awesome games available.

Reviews.Title: I use it everyday
Reviews.Author: Bruce
Reviews.Content: It's really nice to be able browse the web, watch netflix, and message friends while tucked in bed. I don't use it for anything else

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: controller
Reviews.Content: What can I say.  You get what you pay for.  There is no comparison to an apple ipad.  The speed of surfing and download is great.  Still wish it had a usb or sd card port, but that is the only negative thing about this little tablet.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: controller
Reviews.Content: What can I say.  You get what you pay for.  There is no comparison to an apple ipad.  The speed of surfing and download is great.  Still wish it had a usb or sd card port, but that is the only negative thing about this little tablet.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: dyshorse
Reviews.Content: My daughter is opening a new business and the programs on this a awesome. Its easy to use and very functionable.

Reviews.Title: 1 little question
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: i will can buy a black ipad 3 used with ios 5? THE COLOR NO IS SO IMPORTANT BUT... I WILL CAN SHOP WITH IOS 5?

Reviews.Title: Simply wonderful.
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: Incredible product, but anyone who has worked with Apple before knows that.  The iPad 3 is simply unbeatable in design, technology, and ease of use.  I definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: 3rd gen ipad
Reviews.Author: A. Santos
Reviews.Content: I got this for the wife and is very happy with it so far. She takes it along where ever she goes and still exploring the functions. My only disappointment is that it didn't come with a brochure, it's a excellent product.

Reviews.Title: iPad 3rd Generation
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Order on Thursday and received on the following Monday. It was listed as good condition, however it looks brand new and was packaged in a iPad box with manual and charger. Would order again. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Yay!
Reviews.Author: peaseblossom
Reviews.Content: My new constant companion. It came on time and exactly as described. Can't imagine how I did without it before.

Reviews.Title: What's not to love about an Ipad?
Reviews.Author: JeanneD
Reviews.Content: It works, it's amazing.  What more needs to be said.I'm a recent Apple convert, never used their products before, now love them! Next will be an Iphone!

Reviews.Title: Android tablets might have it in price, but definitely not in accessibility
Reviews.Author: Rae
Reviews.Content: Let me preface this by saying: I am a Mac person. If you are a die hard Android fan or a supertech, don't buy an iPad...but for the average Jane, the iPad is an awesome alternative to a computer. I already loved the way my MacBook Pro and iPhone communicated with each other so I had everything, everywhere, but adding an IPad into the mix is amazing.The retina display is gorgeous. It's crisp, clear, and wonderful to look at. Pictures are beautiful, watching movies is enjoyable. I like reading books and magazines on it too. It's comfortable to hold for long periods of time. Siri is a little worthless, but she is amusing. It's easy to type on, and I love being able to iMessage from it. It's easy to take with me, and it's much more pleasant to lay in bed with than my MBP.

Reviews.Title: The iPad is GREAT, but....
Reviews.Author: Dre Bullock
Reviews.Content: The product is great but has a critical flaw. If the iPad was compatible with Adobe Flash then I would give the product 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Bought for my wife's birthday - she loves it.
Reviews.Author: Patrick Birdsall
Reviews.Content: Bought for my wife's birthday - she loves it. 'Nuff said.I am not an "apple-geek", so it takes a bit to get used to giving instructions for a device that I don't use. This one is better that most "intuitive" platforms, such that i have considered getting one to put to work at work.

Reviews.Title: Wife loves it
Reviews.Author: Robert Geer
Reviews.Content: We got this Ipad for the family, and no really has been able to touchit since my wife started it up!

Reviews.Title: Very good service
Reviews.Author: Glenn T. Crane
Reviews.Content: very fast delivery, less than 5 days. Product was brand new in factory sealed box and was perfect. Wife just loves it.Christmas gift.Ipad ordered was "new Ipad" which i thought was Ipad 3, but IPad 4 was what I received.Very good seller.

Reviews.Title: she loves it
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: got as gift for wife, when she opened it ,you would of thought we hit the lotto,she uses it all day,must admit it is nice,and can do quite a bit with it, she is very happy with her ipad

Reviews.Title: I'm not an Apple fanboy...but...the screen clarity is no joke.
Reviews.Author: JSLES
Reviews.Content: Okay...I've gone through 8 tablets in 2 1/2 years in my house.  That includes two iPad 1st generation, Kindles, Asus Transformer, and Galaxy Tab 10.1 and Galaxy Tab 7.0  So clearly I'm not influenced by the Apple.  However, the retina display is by far the best clarity I've seen so far these past 10 months.  I think that the Android competitors need to step up their game.  They've had a couple of stumbles in 2012, after matching Apple throughout 2011.  We shall see.

Reviews.Title: Who doesn't like iPads
Reviews.Author: Doug "Doug"
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my wife and the clarity is unbelievably better that the original.  I dont have to say more.  Buy it.

Reviews.Title: It's an iPad
Reviews.Author: MasterBlaster
Reviews.Content: Works as expected, no problems - verified it genuine via the apple serial number and apple web site for warranty purposes.

Reviews.Title: I Use It For Everything
Reviews.Author: Shanna Fouts
Reviews.Content: One device, I can organize my notes, read books, surf the internet, track my finances, I even downloaded a 3D modeling app so I can work on my 3D design when I'm not at my computer!

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Dinarte
Reviews.Content: very good experience, I recommend it widely, the shipment arrived on time. the product was exactly the that I wanted

Reviews.Title: IPad newbie
Reviews.Author: L. Vincent Ford
Reviews.Content: I'm writing this review on the new iPad. I' still learning all of it's features. I' m more than happy with the product.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Tommy Brumfield
Reviews.Content: One of the greatest gift I every gave my wife, she loves very much.  She has enjoyed her I-Pad greatly

Reviews.Title: iPad 3rd generation
Reviews.Author: Deb
Reviews.Content: What a wonderful Christmas gift!!! Plenty of memory for my pics!There are more features and less than I expected.

Reviews.Title: Joined at hip with my iPad
Reviews.Author: Susan Rausch
Reviews.Content: This is one of my best purchases in the past five years.  I love to play Draw Something & other word on it - my husband poker.  Versatile!

Reviews.Title: This is a great product
Reviews.Author: Edward E. Pittenger "One of many students"
Reviews.Content: There are very many apps for the IPAD that you will not see for other tablets.  Battery is long lasting between charges.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: beijia zhang
Reviews.Content: Almost new ipad for an used ipad price! I am rating using it now :) very happy with my new toy!

Reviews.Title: IPAD new generation
Reviews.Author: Ronaldo
Reviews.Content: IPAD was in great condition, no issues. There was even a extra included! Highly recommend purchases online service and price are great!Very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Wifi version doesn't have true GPS
Reviews.Author: Brother Mark "Brother"
Reviews.Content: One thing I didn't realize when I bought my wifi only version Ipad... it doesn't have true gps functionality.  It uses ip address based location services when you are connected to a wifi signal.  The cellular version includes a gps reciever that functions even if you don't sign up for cellular service.If you download maps in advance, your cellular version ipad can trace your route on the map and function as a super handy 10" screen Garmin.  The wifi version won't be able to locate you on a map away from the wifi signal.If I knew all this when I purchased my wifi version Ipad, I would definitely have bought the cellular model just for the gps feature.  Apple doesn't make this very clear on it's website, but it's in the technical specs.

Reviews.Title: Hands down one of my best purchases
Reviews.Author: Bryan W Lewis
Reviews.Content: I only use it for studying purposes and occasional netflix/amazon/hulu/youtube watching but it has almost become something that I cannot leave the house without. The only thing I regret is not purchasing one with more memory, I basically have no room on the built in hardrive for music or many videos, because I have placed all my photos on there.

Reviews.Title: Don't compromise on memory or internet access!
Reviews.Author: Sally Lawrence "Home Sales Sally"
Reviews.Content: I bought a Kindle Fire when they first came out in the hopes of using it as a pseudo-tablet because at the time I really didn't feel the iPad was ready-for-prime-time as a business tool for me.  The Kindle worked well enough for many of the reasons I bought it (and I absolutely love it as a book reader) but not for everything business-wise.I researched and read reviews for the iPad itself and the apps that I would need before I finally took the plunge and purchased it.  I chose the most memory with WiFi and Cellular coverage because it is primarily a business tool for me.  I need the memory for photos and videos and the cellular coverage so that I can access files and contracts.  It's important to me that I can conduct a complete real estate transaction wherever my clients or I happen to be.Even if you are purchasing primarily as a personal device, you may still want the 64GB version if you store a lot of music as well as photos / video.One of the things I was not able to get conclusive info on before I purchased was whether or not I would have to activate cellular coverage immediately.  The answer is no.  You can do it whenever you want.  I chose to wait until my next billing cycle started just because it was easier to read the bill without the pro-rations.I was a little hesitant about buying it from Amazon instead of from Apple or my phone carrier, but that turned out to be a misplaced concern. As pretty much always, it arrived on time in good condition.  The Amazon price was actually discounted enough that I was able to purchase a cover with the savings.

Reviews.Title: I pad
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Burger
Reviews.Content: it's an I pad... really people, what did you expect it to get 2 stars lol  my wife likes it

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: T. Jung "sonatina"
Reviews.Content: The product arrived very quickly, which was great because I needed it for school. Product was accurately described. I've been using the iPad for a week now and I love it!

Reviews.Title: Works well.
Reviews.Author: David N. Sharlin "magicdoc1"
Reviews.Content: A lttle pricy compared to its competitors, but works well and synks easily with other Apple devices.  Also, looks nice..

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Amanda L. Stephenson "AmandaLyn7986"
Reviews.Content: Highly recommend this product to anyone looking for one! Arrived in said amount of time a well. Thanks and God bless!

Reviews.Title: Merry Christmas
Reviews.Author: Derrick Hodge
Reviews.Content: i bought this for my wife for Christmas. it came like two weeks before Christmas and i have been using it since...i may have to buy her some pots and pans and keep it for myself...lol

Reviews.Title: We Love This Thing!
Reviews.Author: Rusty Schucklefurd
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife for Christmas and wound up giving it to her early (because I couldn't wait).  She absolutely loves it.  She has a quality laptop that she used to take with her so that she could get online if necessary, but having to cart around a laptop is a hassle.  The Ipad fits in her purse and is so practical.No one should think this is a replacement for a laptop - it's not, but it is great for email, browsing the web, and streaming.  She also loves the camera to take pics of grandkids.  It's only 5mp, but still looks good.  Being able to add apps is another thing she loves.Well made and extremely easy to use.  As usual, Apple's quality shows.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Gabriela Landau
Reviews.Content: The display is incredible. Seems faster than previous versions. I strongly recommend this article to anyone Who has not tried it yet

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love it
Reviews.Author: cricket
Reviews.Content: Best thing I have purchased so far I use it every day I use it for everything and take it everywhere oh did I say I love it well I Love it

Reviews.Title: Without any doubts, mac products always be the best
Reviews.Author: Shawn Para "Shawn Para"
Reviews.Content: iPad 3 32G is more valuable than ipad 4. Although new pad has retina, 32G is also worth a 5 star

Reviews.Title: The best portable gaming device!
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: When you download games on the Ipad 3 and start playing, the games have a very good resolution and all of the games are HD.  The applications are different on the Ipad 3 than the laptop or any personal computer.  It is easy to understand and use most of the different games.  The more difficult games to use are: Minecraft and Gravity Guy.  The games that require internet include: MetalStorm, DragonVale, and Battle Bears Royale.  Some good games that don't require internet include: Shufflepack, Fruit Ninja, Temple Run, Urban Crime, and Crash Drive.

Reviews.Title: IPAD 3 = FTW
Reviews.Author: Tillman H. Smoot
Reviews.Content: While the battery is a bit slow to charge, as long as you turn off location services and push notifications, this is a fantastic ipad. I had the original Ipad and this one is leaps light years ahead of it. Speed, image quality, everything about this Ipad, with the exception of the cost is fantastic.If you're thinking about a tablet, Ipad is really the way to go.

Reviews.Title: We Love This Thing!
Reviews.Author: Rusty Schucklefurd
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife for Christmas and wound up giving it to her early (because I couldn't wait).  She absolutely loves it.  She has a quality laptop that she used to take with her so that she could get online if necessary, but having to cart around a laptop is a hassle.  The Ipad fits in her purse and is so practical.No one should think this is a replacement for a laptop - it's not, but it is great for email, browsing the web, and streaming.  She also loves the camera to take pics of grandkids.  It's only 5mp, but still looks good.  Being able to add apps is another thing she loves.Well made and extremely easy to use.  As usual, Apple's quality shows.  I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Gabriela Landau
Reviews.Content: The display is incredible. Seems faster than previous versions. I strongly recommend this article to anyone Who has not tried it yet

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love it
Reviews.Author: cricket
Reviews.Content: Best thing I have purchased so far I use it every day I use it for everything and take it everywhere oh did I say I love it well I Love it

Reviews.Title: Without any doubts, mac products always be the best
Reviews.Author: Shawn Para "Shawn Para"
Reviews.Content: iPad 3 32G is more valuable than ipad 4. Although new pad has retina, 32G is also worth a 5 star

Reviews.Content: When you download games on the Ipad 3 and start playing, the games have a very good resolution and all of the games are HD.  The applications are different on the Ipad 3 than the laptop or any personal computer.  It is easy to understand and use most of the different games. Some good games that don't require internet include: Shufflepack, Fruit Ninja, Temple Run, Urban Crime, and Crash Drive.
